titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that Fort San Juan holds a significant place in the early history of North Carolina and of the United States.
Expressing the sense of Congress that Fort San Juan holds a significant place in the early history of North Carolina and of the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: Recognizes the importance of Fort San Juan to the early history of North Carolina and the United States.
